response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. We believe this price reflects not only the tangible value but also the intangible benefits such as prestige, functionality, and exclusivity associated with owning this product. We look forward to discussing how this investment could elevate your experience and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 2000000}
